MR No. 848 - A Knowledge of God Through Christ

     Who can sweep away the delusions that now exist among professed Christians? Men are making painstaking efforts to see Jerusalem, they are digging in the earth for hidden cities, and to find inscriptions, which the Lord has seen fit to bury with the corrupted, defiled inhabitants, but the Lord has not laid it upon man to search out these mysteries. [FROM THE CONTEXT IT APPEARS THAT ELLEN WHITE IS SIMPLY STATING THAT THERE ARE BETTER WAYS TO "FIND OUT GOD" THAN THROUGH ARCHEOLOGICAL EXCAVATIONS.] We cannot find out God by searching, by seeking to understand mysterious problems.
